title: Developer
text: Full stack- Java Script web developer should have a good knowledge of front end and back end of the web development.

title: CSS
text: Body and style of the web page.

title: Java Script
text: JavaScript is a very powerful client-side scripting language. JavaScript is used mainly for enhancing the interaction of a user with the webpage. In other words, you can make your webpage more lively and interactive, with the help of JavaScript. JavaScript is also being used widely in game development and Mobile application development.
